description:
Scala IDE provides advanced editing and debugging support for the development of pure Scala and mixed Scala-Java applications.
Now with a shiny Scala debugger, semantic highlight, more reliable JUnit test finder, an ecosystem of related plugins, and much more.

Note: Installation renames the default executables "eclipse.exe" and "eclipsec.exe" to "scalaide" and "scalaidec.exe" respectfully.
Note: The source for the chocolatey install can be found here: https://github.com/tstone2077/scalaide.chocolatey
author: http://scala-ide.org/team.html
